Tucson nodded.  He senses an interruption in sonar signal and quickly reali=
zes that someone is able to fight it.  He switches it off.

"Right, Kup, Ro=
dimus, you take Nightlight out of here ASAP. Meet up with Quickstride and R=
at Trap and go as fast as you can back to the Ark.  Nightshift, since you'r=
e small enough and fast on your feet, due to Ninjabot training, I need you =
to seize Darkhawk, and put him in temporary stasis until we can reverse his=
 shell program back to Windlord.  Try not to damage him, just subdue him.  =
Once you do that, rejoin everyone back at the Ark."

Nightshift salutes his=
 leader.

"Got it, but what about you?  What's your game plan?"

Tucson loo=
ks forward.

"Someone has to back you up and divert enemy fire away from hi=
s comrades.  It might as well be me.  Don't worry, I'll be fine."

Nightshi=
ft's optics widen.

"But, slag, that's one hell of a risk...  Look at what =
you're gon' up against...  I dunno, I think ya better have Rodimus back ya =
up.  He's an A class gunner and you're gonna need all the gunn'n you can ge=
t."

Tucson looks to Rodimus.

"Rodimus, Change of plan.  Nightshift's righ=
t.  I shouldn't try to do this alone.  And I know you wish to redeem yourse=
lf faithfully.  Well, this is where we begin.  I trust you'll be able to ha=
ndle this with ease."

He alligns his missile launchers in anticipation of =
a shoot out.

" So, Hydras wants a fight, he's just got himself one."
